decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted for car wash and car valet purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times Monday to Saturday: 9am to 6pm and Sunday and Public Holidays 10am to 4pm.

Condition : 4 - The scheme of sound mitigation, including noise attenuation barrier and equipment psecifications, as detailed on the approved drawings and supporting documents shall be carried out and in place before the use hereby permitted first commences, and shall  thereafter be retained.

Condition : 5 - Prior to the development hereby approved commencing operation, full details including drawings detailing pedestrian access routes within the car park, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall thereafter be carried out in accordance with the approved details and these shall be  provided before the use hereby approved commences and retained thereafter.
description: Reconfiguration of the car park serving the Tesco store and relocation of existing hand car wash.
